title: Should I Overlook His Trust Issues
itunes:title: Should I Overlook His Trust Issues
description:
Dear Steven Shirley I'm a 32 year old divorced mother of five. Recently I met the man that I am now in love with. The chemistry was bananas from the moment we met. He accepted my children with no problem. To top it all off he's tall dark handsome and the sex is so good. It brought a tear to my eye one night........

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
